parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Wear of Front Brake Pads and Rotors
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive wear of the front brake pads and rotors can lead to reduced braking performance, increasing the stopping distance and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: Uneven brake pad wear
excessive brake dust
grinding or squealing noise when applying the brakes
vibrations when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the brake master cylinder can cause extended stopping distances, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: ABS light illuminates
spongy brake pedal
extended stopping distance
brake pedal feels soft or spongy.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Rear brake lock-up can cause the vehicle to skid or lose control, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Rear brakes lock up
vehicle skids or loses control
especially on wet or dry pavement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the ABS can cause the vehicle to lose control, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: ABS light illuminates
loss of braking control
vehicle skids or loses control
especially on wet or dry pavement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the windshield wipers can reduce visibility while driving, especially in rainy or snowy conditions, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Windshield wipers stop working or work intermittently
obstructing the driver's visibility
especially during rainy or snowy weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of seat belts to remain securely in place can lead to reduced effectiveness in the event of a crash, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: Seat belts fall between the chair and folding armrest
seat belts are loose and do not provide adequate restraint.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Ingress Due to Design Defect
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design defect allowing water to accumulate on the top of the vehicle can cause water to enter the vehicle during sudden stops, potentially leading to electrical system failures, corrosion, and safety hazards.
symptoms: Water accumulation on the top of the vehicle
water entering the vehicle during sudden stops
water seepage into the interior
electrical system malfunctions
corrosion of components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the door latch can cause the passenger side door to open unexpectedly while driving, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The passenger side door opens unexpectedly while driving
the door latch feels loose or faulty
the door does not stay closed while driving
the door opens during turns or sudden stops.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Airbag and Seatbelt Failure in Frontal Collision
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag to deploy and the seatbelt to restrain the driver in a frontal collision can increase the risk of serious injury or fatality.
symptoms: Airbag does not deploy
seatbelt does not lock or restrain the driver
driver is not properly secured during a collision
increased risk of injury or fatality.
